sentences.en: a plot to assassinate the President
At the entry for " kill " , my thesaurus lists " murder " , " assassinate " and " waste " .
sentences.cn: 我的同义词词典在kill条目中列出murder, assassinate, waste 词条.

sentences.en: Kill , Assassinate , Execute , Dispatch , Murder , Slay, Slaughter.
Perhaps they intend to assassinate me.
The foreigner learned martial arts here from we, later knife sword to assassinate us!
sentences.cn: 外国人从我们这里学会了武术, 以后就刀剑来刺杀我们!

sentences.en: The plot assassinate the governor was discovered by the FBI.
sentences.cn: 谋杀州长的阴谋被联邦调查局所查获.

sentences.en: The Secret Service smelled out a plot to assassinate the President.
sentences.cn: 情报部门发现了行刺总统的阴谋.

sentences.en: There was a deep plot to assassinate the leader.
sentences.cn: 有个刺杀领导人的老谋深算的密谋.
